pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Eye Tuck Hydration Cream 15mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors eyetuck™ is a targeted treatment to visibly decrease puffy under eye bags in 15 days making skin appear tighter and smoother. 15ml.

Skin Doctors eyetuck™ is a targeted treatment to visibly reduce the puffiness of under eye bags making skin under the eyes appear tighter, smoother and more uniform. It helps to: Reduce pooling of water under the eyes and moisturise and condition the delicate skin under the eyes. Recommended for: All skin types and age. Specifically formulated to treat skin that has under eye bags and puffiness.

Size: 15mL

Ingredients

Key Ingredients: Eyeseryl - a tetra peptide that helps visibly decongest the under eye area, removing excess water that has pooled there. Apricot Oil - moisturising and revitalizing properties that care for the drying and ageing skin of the delicate eye area. It is known for it's ability to penetrate the skin without leaving an oily feel. Shea Butter - a superior moisturiser from the shea nut.
All Ingredients:Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Isopropyl Myristate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil,Polysorbate 60, Propylene Glycol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-5, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Triethanolamine, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Propylparaben.

Directions

Usage: Under and outer eye area. Process: After cleansing, dispense half a pump, size of a grain of rice, onto your ring finger. Gently pat around the under part of the eye, starting from the inside corner of the eye patting outwards. Apply any excess on the brow bone. Best results: Use morning and night. Use in conjunction with Skin Doctors™ SPF protection during the day and your choice of Skin Doctors™ moisturiser at night.
